TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GestureRecognitionResult extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 包含有关墨迹笔势的信息。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 包含正确标识笔势的和 likeliness 级别。 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>
使用属性可确定<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正确标识手势的 likeliness 级别。 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>标识笔势。 此示例假设有一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>被调用`inkCanvas1`的, 并且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已连接到代码中的事件处理程序。
[!code-csharp[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationGesture As ApplicationGesture
public: property System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture ApplicationGesture { System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取已识别的墨迹笔势。

remarks.format:
